alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Lawrence; Washington (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 28 at 9:30PM EST until January 31 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Indianapolis IN has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Indiana... East Fork White River at Seymour. White River at Hazleton. Tippecanoe River near Delphi. Wildcat Creek near Lafayette. .Brief new flooding is expected along several rivers and streams with more widespread flooding ongoing elsewhere across central Indiana. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...East Fork White River at Seymour. * WHEN...From this evening to Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 13.5 feet, Lowland flood continues. County Road 700 E begins to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 PM EST Sunday the stage was 12.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:45 PM EST Sunday was 12.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 13.4 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage Tuesday evening. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. The next statement should be issued Monday afternoon by around 1230 PM EST /1130 AM CST/.
